channel.title: Help Wanted: Alien Miscellaneous Names!
channel.description:
So, my Masks campaign is headed to space! And based on everything so far, we're going full weird Marvel space fantasy and all. Right now, what I'm in most need of is **names**. Species names, empire names, names for miscellaneous stuff. They don't need any fiction attached, I just want a bunch of names to spark my imagination and draw from, stuff like "The Shi'ar Empire" and "yaro root" and "The Chitauri".
Currently, to give you a clearer idea of tone/feel, we've got a planet named Bezzulah and a substance called Zamzar Gum that have been established in the fiction already. So a little goofy, but not too outright goofy and definitely fantastical. I appreciate any ones I get!

item.title: Help Wanted: Alien Miscellaneous Names!
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Lowell’s mood elements for alien planets might interest you!

And here’s some off-the-dome names for cosmic stuff:
The Kleegorian Empire
The Harper Homeworld
The Vastness of Dren
The St’v-nth Fleet
Onazol the Omiscient
Deepest Sarbrescian Space
The Rellim Drive
The Tiger-Raiders of HOGL 9

Read full topic

item.title: Help Wanted: Alien Miscellaneous Names!
item.dc:creator: @Jmstar
item.description:
@Jmstar wrote:

Check out the Martian and Orrakachu lists from the Story Games Name Project
